channel.title: Hi, I'm Osman and I'm building HelloPosts.com
channel.description:
Looking forward to talking about bootstrapping with you all. I'm 17 years old and currently work at a startup doing growth (marketing, biz dev, etc.).
I'm a decent web developer and I will be building HelloPosts myself.
I've founded or been a part of various small online businesses in the past few years. HelloPosts will be my first actual product.
I plan on blogging about building a product so if you're interested in that, follow me here: https://twitter.com/osmnshkh
